column4: Hello, hope you are all having a good one today. I just wanted to say as a newbie, the more i learn about linux, ubuntu, the community, you guys, etc. the more i am impressed, if no one else has thanked you lately THANKS 4 BEING HERE 4 US!
what are the most popular irc clients /scripts for linux?
irssi is pretty popular to the less command line alergic users.
Xchat is pretty popular for the rodent dependant.
